remarks.format: ## Remarks 类继承自，并且可以包含在。The class inherits from and can be contained in a . 提供了源代码文件，包括已生成的文件的唯一标识。 provides the unique identification of source files, including files that have been generated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example shows the use of the class. summary.span: 获取或设置 GUID，该 GUID 标识要使用的校验和算法。

span.span: Gets or sets a GUID that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.

value.span: ，它标识要使用的校验和算法。

span.span: A that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供 MD5 和 SHA1 哈希算法。Algorithms are provided for the MD5 and SHA1 hashes. 若要使用的 MD5 哈希的 GUID 值是 {0x406ea660、 0x64cf、 0x4c82、 0xb6，0xf0、 0x42，0xd4、 0x81，0x72、 0xa7，0x99}。The GUID value to use for the MD5 hash is {0x406ea660, 0x64cf, 0x4c82, 0xb6, 0xf0, 0x42, 0xd4, 0x81, 0x72, 0xa7, 0x99}. 若要使用的 SHA1 哈希的 GUID 是 {0xff1816ec、 0xaa5e、 0x4d10、 0x87 0xf7、 0x6f，0x49、 0x63，0x83、 0x34，0x60}。The GUID to use for the SHA1 hash is {0xff1816ec, 0xaa5e, 0x4d10, 0x87, 0xf7, 0x6f, 0x49, 0x63, 0x83, 0x34, 0x60}. 校验和计算是特定于语言的。The calculation of the checksum is language-specific. 也就是说，语言供应商可以使用任一调试器已知的哈希算法以计算校验和。That is, the language vendor can use any of the hashing algorithms known to the debugger to calculate the checksum. 此属性的 GUID 用于提供哈希算法可扩展性。The use of a GUID for this property provides hash algorithm extensibility. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的设置属性。The following code example shows the setting of the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/CS/codedirective.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/VB/codedirective.vb#6)]
